lead_paragraph: The Irish’s Bonzie Colson finished with a career high in points, and Demetrius Jackson contributed 22, as Notre Dame knocked off the Blue Devils on the road.

headline.print_headline: Notre Dame Sends No. 9 Duke to a Second Straight Loss; No. 2 Oklahoma Survives
headline.main: Notre Dame Sends No. 9 Duke to a Second Straight Loss; No. 2 Oklahoma Survives

snippet: The Irish’s Bonzie Colson finished with a career high in points, and Demetrius Jackson contributed 22, as Notre Dame knocked off the Blue Devils on the road.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Notre Dame men's basketball team defeats Duke, 95-91; other men's and women's college basketball scores noted.
